name: Wood Beam
description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood beams require another structure for adjacent 'snapping' and seem to apply 'well stabilized' to a larger area than theThatch Beam.
